summary: This document is an email chain from October 15, 2020, in which a federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York requests access to grand jury materials from a Florida state court related to the Jeffrey Epstein investigation and the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell. The email is forwarded to a Chief Communications Officer and a Chief Operating Officer/Acting General Counsel for the Florida court to facilitate the request.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The federal prosecutor from the Southern District of New York who is handling the ongoing investigation regarding Jeffrey Epstein and prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell, and is requesting grand jury materials from a Florida court.

persons.name: AUSA
persons.context: A colleague of the requesting federal prosecutor, copied on the email regarding the request for grand jury materials related to the Epstein investigation.

persons.name: Chief Communications Officer
persons.context: The recipient of the initial request who states they handle communications for the office and connects the federal prosecutor with the appropriate legal and records personnel.

persons.name: Chief Operating Officer for Courts and Legal Records and our Acting General Counsel
persons.context: The person identified by the Chief Communications Officer as the correct contact to walk the federal prosecutor through the process of obtaining grand jury materials.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the federal investigation for which grand jury materials are being sought; his prosecution is referenced.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the federal prosecution mentioned by the prosecutor; the investigation is ongoing regarding her.

connections.description: Colleagues and federal prosecutors working together on the Epstein/Maxwell investigation, as both are copied on the records request email.
The federal prosecutor is handling the ongoing investigation regarding Jeffrey Epstein.
The federal prosecutor is handling the prosecution of Ghislaine Maxwell.
Both are central figures in the federal investigation and prosecution mentioned by the prosecutor.

events.title: Federal Request for Florida Grand Jury Materials
events.description: A federal prosecutor from the SDNY emails a Florida court to request transcripts, records, and related materials from grand jury presentations relevant to the Epstein investigation.
personsInvolved: Chief Operating Officer for Courts and Legal Records and our Acting General Counsel

keyFacts: Federal prosecutors from the Southern District of New York were actively seeking grand jury materials from a Florida state court in October 2020 as part of the ongoing Epstein investigation and Maxwell prosecution.
The request indicates that evidence and witness testimony relevant to the federal investigation may have been presented to a Florida grand jury during the state prosecution of Jeffrey Epstein.
The email chain shows procedural coordination between federal and state legal systems, with the federal prosecutors offering to obtain a federal unsealing order if required.
The communication highlights the multi-jurisdictional nature of the Epstein case, linking federal investigations in New York with prior state proceedings in Florida.
